a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Threshold income for each decile (after tax), United States, 1963 to
The level of income per year below which 10%, 20%, 30%, etc. of the population falls. Income here is measured after taxes
Note: This data is measured in international-$ at 2017 prices to account for inflation and differences in the cost of living between
